com.mindfusion.charting

Class CandlestickRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.charting.SeriesRenderer
      • com.mindfusion.charting.Renderer2D
        • com.mindfusion.charting.CandlestickRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataChangedListener, SeriesContainer, java.util.EventListener

    public class CandlestickRenderer
extends Renderer2D
    A SeriesRenderer that draws candlesticks in its containing plot.
